info.name: Three Halflings in a Trenchcoat
info.description: HOMEBREW three halflings in a trenchcoat fighter archetype

description.p: These three halflings are fucking tired of tall people giving them shit. Looked down upon by the commonfolk, they've decided to blend in with the crowds in order to stab anyone whos taller than them, or something...

sheet.description: The archetypal THINAT excels at mounted combat.

description.p: When you choose this archetype at 1st level, you gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Insight, Performance, or Persuasion. Alternatively, you learn one language of your choice.
You gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Insight, Performance, or Persuasion.
You learn one language of your choice.

Your dexterity is focused on keeping balance. have disadvantage on dex checks and saves. You have disadvantage on dex checks and saves. Your movement speed is decreased by five. Ranged attacks also have disadvantage. But hey, you'll be able to do so much stabbing.

sheet.description: You have disadvantage on dex checks and saves. Your movement speed is decreased by five. Ranged attacks also have disadvantage

description.p: They say two heads are better than one, and six fists are certainly better than two.

sheet.description: Your fighter makes three attacks instead of one, one for each halfling. You can use action surge or haste with this feature as well (e.g. A level 5 TTF can make 6 attacks per turn, 12 with action surge).

description.p: Starting at the 7th level, at the start of your turn, you may choose to take a calculated risk to split up into three halflings and surround an attacker to make an attack. This feature can only be used if there are no hostile witnesses. You must resume your base form at the end of your turn. All attacks made against the target have advantage, and you do not suffer the price of power.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

description.p: Starting at the 10th level THERE CAN BE NO WITNESSESS. anyone witness foreign to the party is terrified. You can use this feature anywhere. Your secret is safe.

sheet.description: Upon using the multiform technique, anyone witness that is not in your party is terrified. They cannot reveal your secret.

description.p: At the 15th level, you have mastered the art of balancing three people in a trenchcoat. Your movements look almost real but not quite, causing a feeling of unease. You gain advantage on all intimidation checks to anyone who hasn't seen through your disguise.

sheet.description: You have advantage on all intimidation checks to anyone who hasn't seen through your disguise.

description.p: At the 18th level, you call upon a fourth halfling, Steve, to aid your journey. You are now four halflings in a trenchcoat. Where you would attack thee times, you now attack four. This continues to work with Action Surges / Haste etc. All other statistics (including HP, attunement etc. remain the same and are unaffected).

sheet.description: Steve shows up, allowing for four attacks instead of three
